title: German and British naval rivalry effects

content.prompt: The rivalry depicted in the cartoon had which of the following effects on European politics in the period before the First World War?

choices.label: It undermined Germanyâ€™s efforts to isolate France diplomatically.
It spurred widespread support for international disarmament.
It triggered political crises in Germany and Britain caused by resistance to high levels of military spending.
It encouraged other European powers to attempt to match the size of the British navy.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
